text: Thomas Jarrell "Jerry" Coody (born October 3, 1931) was a Cherokee-American football player who played for the Calgary Stampeders. He played college football at Baylor University and is a member of the school's athletic hall of fame. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Canadian football running backs Category:Baylor Bears football players Category:American football halfbacks Category:American players of Canadian football
title: Jerry Coody
